resources.string: This app is used to create a system to manage all the operations associated with a Government Hospital. The different modules covered in this app are :
Personal Details, Appointments,Apply for Leaves and view Previous Leaves
Personal Details, Appointments with Doctor view Previous Appointments,view Reports ,clear history
Which will control all the core management tasks. Grant appointments, grant leaves for doctors, delete users, add any users

Admins need to add Doctors Specialization and the preferred tme slot for the first time in order to get the appointments from patients, it\'s the mandatory step without which the doctors can\'t be shown in the appointments list
Patient will get the option to get an appointment with doctor, if the doctors available in their time slot, from there they will have option to select preferred time slot for the appointment
